Interface Point

public interface Point

Custom version of Point

Some methods integrates Vector.

Adam Juraszek

isInside

boolean isInside(Point p1,
                 Point p2)
Test if this point lies inside of a rectangle defined by two opposite corners.

Return value for an edge is implementation specific.

Parameters:
p1 - corner of rectangle
p2 - opposite corner of rectangle
Returns:
true if this point lies inside, false otherwise
